channel.title: Projects on John Rooney
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on John Rooney

item.title: Shopify Product Extractor
item.description: I created this scraper for a client who ran over 300 Shopify webstores, and wanted to extract the image URL along with some other data for each one.

item.title: Job Site Scraper
item.description: I was asked if I could scrape a jobsite at regular intervals for a client who would then sort through the data for personal use.
